verses.text: Ha t'a yic schanhil ab'il yoch winhaj Joacim yuninal winhaj Josías reyal t'a Judá, ayic toxo ix tz'ib'chaj yuj winhaj Baruc yuninal winhaj Nerías tas ix wal Jeremías in tik schecab' in Dios, ata' ix wal t'a winhaj Baruc chi':

Ha Jehová ko Diosal tz'alan t'ayach icha tik: Ach Baruc, wan alan icha tik: Ob'iltac in. Anhej yaelal yet' ilk'olal syak' Jehová t'ayin. Vanxo in k'unb'i woq'ui, maxtzac yal wik'an wip swab'i, xa chi.
Ina a in Jehová in, tzin satel tas ix in b'o'o, wan in tok'ank'eta tas ix wawej t'a masanil jun nación tik.

¿Tom smoj tza k'an tas tz'aj a k'echaanh? Manhxo a k'ana', yujto ol wak'och yaelal t'a yib'anh masanil anima. Palta a in Jehová in swala', yalnhej b'aj ol ach k'ochoc, manh ol ach in cha miljocchamoc, xchi Jehová, xin chi t'a winh.
